uas.session.sessionLifetimeInterval.tooltip: Time interval in milliseconds at which 'Session Lifetime' is checked
uas.session.notConnectedSession.tooltip: If yes, the oldest disconnected session is deleted if the maximum number of parallel sessions is reached
uas.session.maxNumberReferences.tooltip: Limits the maximum number of references returned in a 'Browse' request
uas.session.maxParallelServiceCalls.text: Maximum number of parallel service calls
uas.session.maxParallelServiceCalls.tooltip: Maximum number of parallel active service calls per OPC UA Server

uas.subscription.minLifetime.tooltip: Minimum supported Lifetime interval after which the Subscription elapses (milliseconds).
uas.subscription.maxLifetime.tooltip: Maximum supported Lifetime interval after which the Subscription elapses (milliseconds)
uas.subscription.maxSupportedEvents.tooltip: Maximum supported number of Events queued in one Monitored Item
uas.subscription.maxSupportedValues.tooltip: Maximum supported number of values queued in one Monitored Item
uas.subscription.maxNotificationPerPublish.tooltip: Sum of values and events in one Publish response
uas.subscription.numEventNotifiers.tooltip: Number of Event Notifiers and Event Sources
uas.subscription.numMonitoredItems.tooltip: Total number of available Monitored Items
uas.subscription.maxNumMonitoredItems.text: Maximum number of Monitored Items per Subscription
uas.subscription.maxNumMonitoredItems.tooltip: Maximum number of Monitored Items in one Subscription
uas.subscription.numNotificationMessages.text: Number of Notification Messages per session
uas.subscription.numNotificationMessages.tooltip: Also known as Retransmission Queue. It should be at least twice the maximum number of Publish requests in one session
uas.subscription.maxPublishRequests.text: Maximum queued Publish requests per session
uas.subscription.maxPublishRequests.tooltip: Maximum queued Publish requests in one session
uas.subscription.numSessionsWithSubscriptions.text: Number of sessions that can have Subscriptions
uas.subscription.numSessionsWithSubscriptions.tooltip: Only this number of sessions can have a Subscription
uas.subscription.maxNumSubscriptions.text: Maximum number of Subscriptions per session
uas.subscription.maxNumSubscriptions.tooltip: Maximum number of Subscriptions in one session
